00009 double Algorithm::MaxBinAmplitude::operator() (const TPulseIsland* tpi) {
00010 
00011   // Get the samples and get an iterator ready to find the peak sample
00012   std::vector<int> pulseSamples = tpi->GetSamples();  
00013   std::vector<int>::iterator peak_sample_pos;
00014 
00015   // Find the position of the peak samples
00016   if (trigger_polarity == 1)
00017     peak_sample_pos = std::max_element(pulseSamples.begin(), pulseSamples.end());
00018   else if (trigger_polarity == -1)
00019     peak_sample_pos = std::min_element(pulseSamples.begin(), pulseSamples.end());
00020 
00021   // Now calculate the amplitude
00022   double amplitude = trigger_polarity*(*peak_sample_pos - pedestal);
00023 
00024   return amplitude;
00025 }

00027 double Algorithm::MaxBinTime::operator() (const TPulseIsland* tpi) {
00028 
00029   // Get the samples and get an iterator ready to find the peak sample
00030   std::vector<int> pulseSamples = tpi->GetSamples();  
00031   std::vector<int>::iterator peak_sample_pos;
00032 
00033   // Find the position of the peak samples
00034   if (trigger_polarity == 1)
00035     peak_sample_pos = std::max_element(pulseSamples.begin(), pulseSamples.end());
00036   else if (trigger_polarity == -1)
00037     peak_sample_pos = std::min_element(pulseSamples.begin(), pulseSamples.end());
00038 
00039   // Now calculate the time
00040   double time = ((tpi->GetTimeStamp() + (peak_sample_pos - pulseSamples.begin())) * clock_tick_in_ns) - time_shift;
00041 
00042   return time;
00043 }

00045 double Algorithm::ConstantFractionTime::operator() (const TPulseIsland* tpi) {
00046 
00047   const std::vector<int>& samps = tpi->GetSamples();
00048   std::vector<int>::const_iterator b = samps.begin(), e = samps.end();
00049 
00050   std::vector<int>::const_iterator m = trigger_polarity > 0 ? std::max_element(b, e) : std::min_element(b, e);
00051   int amp = *m;
00052   int thresh = trigger_polarity > 0 ? (unsigned int)(th_frac*(double)(max_adc_value - pedestal) + pedestal) : (unsigned int)((1.-th_frac)*pedestal);
00053   unsigned int cf = trigger_polarity > 0 ? (unsigned int)(constant_fraction*(double)(amp-pedestal)) + pedestal : (unsigned int)((double)(pedestal-amp)*(1.-constant_fraction) + amp);
00054 
00055   double t=0;
00056   if ((trigger_polarity > 0 ? amp > thresh : amp < thresh) && (trigger_polarity > 0 ? amp < max_adc_value : amp > 0)) {
00057     std::vector<int>::const_iterator c = m;
00058     while ((trigger_polarity > 0 ? *--m > (int)cf : *--m < (int)cf) && m != b);
00059     if (*(m+1) == *m)
00060       t = (double)(m-b);
00061     else
00062       t = (double)((int)cf - *m)/(double)(*(m+1) - *m) + (double)(m-b);
00063   }
00064 
00065   double time = clock_tick_in_ns * (t + (double)tpi->GetTimeStamp() - time_shift);
00066 
00067   return time;
00068 }
00069 
00070 double Algorithm::SimpleIntegral::operator() (const TPulseIsland* tpi) {
00071   const std::vector<int>& samples = tpi->GetSamples();
00072   
00073   double length = samples.size();
00074   double tempint = 0;
00075   for(std::vector<int>::const_iterator sIt = samples.begin(); sIt != samples.end(); sIt++)
00076     tempint += *sIt;
00077   
00078   double integral = trigger_polarity * (tempint - (pedestal * length));
00079 
00080   return integral;
00081 }
